      Methods in org.xchain.framework.hibernate with parameters of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean QualifiedEntityPermission.implies(Permission p) 
      boolean EntityPermission.implies(Permission permission)
      This method only returns true if the specified permission is the same instance as this instance.
      boolean EntityClassPermission.implies(Permission permission)
      This method returns false, since EntityPermission subclasses should never be tied to an Identity.
      abstract java.lang.Object QualifiedEntityPermission.qualifyPermission(Permission p)
      Performs the database-level context filtering for the permission.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      The AllPermission implies everything.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Permission> IdentityImpl.getPermissions() 
      java.util.Set<Permission> Identity.getPermissions()
      Returns all the Permissions that this Identity has.
      Methods in org.xchain.framework.security with parameters of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SecurityManager.checkPermission(Permission permission)
      Checks the Permission against the current Identity, as provided by the IdentityManager.
      boolean SecurityManager.hasPermission(Permission permission) 
      boolean Permission.implies(Permission permission)
      Implies is the mechanism by which we verify that an authenticated Identity can perform an action.
      boolean AllPermission.implies(Permission permission)
      This will return the truth value of permission != null.
